content: crochet stuffy turtle material mc = main color / top shell color 8g cc = contrasting color / head tail and arms 18g i used cotton or acrylic yarn caron simply yarn crochet 3 5 paperclip for marking the beginning of the row scissors security eyes / stuffing green police= specifics to be aware top shell with mc round 1 10sc in magic_ring 10 round 2 2sc in each st around 20 round 3 single_crochet in next st 2sc in next st around 30 round 4 single_crochet in each stitch around 30 round 5 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2sc in next st around 40 round 6 single_crochet in each st around 40 round 7 in the front loops for this round only single_crochet in each st around 40 fasten_off secure and weave in the ends bottom shell with cc round 1 10sc in magic_ring 10 round 2 2sc in each st around 20 round 3 single_crochet in next st 2sc in next st around 30 round 4 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2sc in next st around 40 round 5-6 single_crochet in each st around 40 fasten_off and leave a tail for sewing head with cc round 1 10sc in magic_ring 10 round 2 single_crochet in next st 2sc in next st around 15 round 3-4 single_crochet in each st around 15 round 5 single_crochet in next st decrease around 10 round 6-7 single_crochet in each st around 10 fasten_off and leave a tail for closing if you are using safety eyes place them before closing the head between round 3 and 4 approx 5 stitches apart stuff moderately firm weave in the tail through the final round and draw up tight to close secure and weave in the ends tail with cc round 1 4sc in magic_ring 4 round 2 single_crochet in each st around 4 round 3 2sc in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts 5 fasten_off leave a tail for sewing no stuffing fasten_off and leave a tail for closing flippers with cc make 4 round 1 8sc in magic_ring 8 round 2 2sc in each st around 16 round 3 single_crochet in each st around 16 there is no need to stuff the flippers row 1 flatten to match up the stitches and single_crochet in the next 8 sts across fasten_off leave a long tail to sew to the bottom of the body assemble 1- head attach to the last round of the back shell/ body 2- tail and flippers no need to stuff the tail attach at the oppose side of the head and work the flippers around 3- place both shell facing each other s and sew the two pieces together put all yarn tails inside go through the back loop of the top shell and the 2 loops of the body before closing off fill the fiber inside @thepetitatelier m decriem - marjorie decriem@gmail com if you re using this pattern or take advantage of one
